description.value:
+10 to all Intimidate Tests Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Brass Medal in the shape of a Bolter Shell hanging from a crimson ribbon

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for Unhesitating Dedication to the maintenance of Discipline, such as a Commissar executing 2+ individuals to prevent a rout.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
